1111111.content:
My mother said that moving was going to be a new and fun experience, boy did she lie. We spent months packing all are things into boxes and loading them into trucks. It was a lot of work, and my sister Hailey didn’t really do much to help me and mom a whole lot either.
Oh, I’m sorry, I forgot to introduce myself. My name is Tony, I’m Sixteen and I live with my Thirty five year old mother and thirteen year old sister. My father divorced my mom when I was only six and my mother was pregnant with Hailey. This move is the biggest thing mom has ever done since the divorce. So she’s really happy, which makes me happy. I really hate to see girls cry.
The house we we’re going to move into was a large old house that looked like it could be in a horror movie. She said that it was a great home, and that it was a bit of a fixer upper. Yah, right. This house is a piece crap! There is no heating in the living room, and there is no lighting in it. The bedrooms have only two temperatures; summer day, or winter night during a full moon. So it’s best not to use the heating in the rooms. When we arrived at the house that day, there was the original owner waiting for us at the door. He was an old gent that has seen some things in his years.
“So good to see you all.” He said. The man handed mom some keys. “Here is the keys to the house, treat her well.” Before we could ask him any questions that we had, he ran off down the road, shouting with glee.
“That was odd.” I said, scratching my medium length black hair.
“And very creepy in a strange way.” Hailey added, texting her friend. Mom didn’t really care. She was still very excited about getting the house and for a very cheap price.
“I just glad that the house is finally ours.” Her smile then became a puzzled look. “I still wonder why he gave for free though.” But instead of questioning it, she just shrugged it off. Unloading the truck, with no help from Hailey, we managed to get all of our stuff, inside the house. I had to help mom with her things into her room which was on the first floor. She didn’t have a whole lot of things. She never really kept much for herself. Hailey on the other hand, had over a million things that were hers. She had things from when she was three still. Mom told me to help her take her stuff into her room which was near the downstairs bathroom. The sad part was Hailey didn’t help me take her stuff into her room. I didn’t mind helping, I just wish that she would help.
Once their stuff was in their rooms, and the things that go in the other far corners of the house were out in their spots, it was my turn to take my stuff to my room, which was on the second floor. Having to go up three flights of stairs, I finally reached my room. Going inside for the first time, I could see why mom gave me the room. Going to the closet to put my things away for now, I noticed a mirror inside on the door. It looked very old and somewhat modern. It had a very Victorian border, yet looked like a full body mirror you’d find in the bathroom. Not giving it a second thought, I quickly put my things that were going to stay in the closet and shut the door. The only problem was that it wouldn’t shut.
‘It’s still new, you can fix it later.’ Heading into the bathroom, I decided to take a shower, for moving all the boxes was very tiring work. No thanks to Hailey. While I grabbed some new clothes from one of the boxes in the closet, I felt something odd. It was as if someone was watching me. Turning around, I couldn’t see anyone at all. The only things that were in here was the huge desk and bed that was left behind. Shrugging it off, I went into the bathroom and started the shower. Stripping, I jumped in and cleaned off all of the work that I put in today. Ever since dad left mom, forcibly, not willingly, I have taken the role as man of the house. Doing all the things that dad did. Fixing things, painting, and all that fun stuff.
After I was done and dried off, I headed out to put on my clean clothes when I felt that strange presence again that I felt earlier. Looking around, I saw no one in the room but me. Taking off my towel to get dressed, I heard a female laugh coming from the closet. Looking inside, I saw no one in it. I was used to weird things, but this was a bit much. Later that night, after I helped mom set up the living room, still without the help of the all-mighty Hailey; I retired to sleep early, for I had to hook up Hailey’s stereo.
Up in my room, I turned off the main light and turned on the lamp that was beside my new bed. It too looked a bit Victorian like the mirror. Striping down to my boxers, I climbed into bed and turned off the light. As I lay in bed, I could still feel like someone was watching me. Rolling over, I was faced to face with the mirror on the closet door. Looking into it, I saw something strange; I saw that I wasn’t in it. I didn’t see my face looking back at me. But I did see a lump sleeping in the bed in the mirror. Getting out of bed, I jumped over to the mirror and took a closer look. I didn’t show up in it, no matter how close I got to it. Too tired to really care, I gave up and headed back to bed when someone spoke.
“Hello?” The voice came from the mirror. Turning around, I saw that the form in the bed was sitting up and looking right at me. Taking a quick glance at my bed, I could see that there was nothing in it.
“There no one in the bed.” The girl in the mirror got out of the bed and what seemed like it, walked up to the mirror. This girl didn’t look all that bad to me. She had hair that went down her back that was a very dark blonde color. Her skin looked very smooth, and her eyes were a very deep blue. She looked very cute.
“Why thank you.” I jumped when she said that. How did she know?
“I read your mind.” Knowing this now, I decided that asking questions was a good idea.
“What are you?” The girl tilted her head to the side and gave me a crocked frown.
“I’m a girl. What the hell am I suppose to be? Bugs bunny?” That set me off.
“I didn’t mean it like that! When I said ‘What are you’, I was talking about the fact that you’re in mirror and I can’t see myself!” The girl looked around her room, which looked like mine in every way, and had a puzzled look on her face.
“I don’t really know that. All I know is that I’m stuck here.” She tried to push on the mirror, only to no avail. “I can’t really get out.” Taking another look over her, she was wearing a long shirt that went past her knees. She looked so small with it on.
“Hey! I’m not small! I’m 5’7!” That was getting annoying really fast.
“How are you reading my mind?” The girl shrugged.
“I duh know. Your mouth doesn’t move, yet it’s like you’re still talking, very loudly.” That explains part of it.
“Can I hear your thoughts?” She just stood there, not saying anything for about five minutes.
“Did you hear that?” she asked. I shook my head for a no, which brought her to smile. “Then I don’t think that it works for you.” Wonderful, I’m stuck with a girl that can hear my thoughts.
“Hey, I don’t like it either. You think I like being stuck in a mirror having to technically share a room.” She didn’t seem happy.
“Well, if you’re going to stay, can I at least get your name?” I asked, wanting to end this conversation. The girl glared at me with evil eyes.
“Ya know, it’s customary for the man to say his name first.” I sighed and shook my head.
“Tony Vladimore.” I was waiting for her to tell me her name, but instead, she went over to the bed and went back to sleep. Great, that was really nice. Getting back in bed, I went back to sleep. As I lay in bed, the girl said something.
“Tonya.” And she said nothing else after that. Well, at least I know her name.
“And that’s all you get to know.”
The next day, I had a very rude awakening.
“Hey! Get up!” Getting up, I looked over at my door to see that it was still closed. “It’s about time, thought you were never going to get up.” That’s when I remembered what happened last night. Looking over at the mirror, I saw that Tonya was real, and not a dream.
“Of course I’m real dumb ass.” She was acting very rude toward me for some reason.
“What else am I supposed to do? I can’t leave.”
“Would you just shut up?” I yelled at her. I must have said it too loud, for mom came running up the stairs and knocked on my door.
“Tony, are you alright?” Damn, why know? Wait, this is perfect, she can come in and see Tonya and do something about it. Letting her in, I pushed her to my closet.
“No mom, there’s a girl in my mirror and she’s really annoying!” Mom looked at the mirror and then back at me.
“Hun, there’s no one there but us.” I was confused. Looking at the mirror, I saw the same thing as I did last night, a room like mine, with no Tony in it, not even mom. But she could see herself and me in it.
“Are you feeling okay?” She asked, putting her hand on my fore head.
“I’m fine mom.” Sighing, mom left the room and went back down stairs.
“That was close!” I jumped from the sudden voice. I looked back at the mirror to find Tonya hiding behind the bed.
“I don’t think she could see you.” I said, going into the closet to get some clothes on.
“So, wouldn’t it be weird if she found out that a girl was living in your mirror?” I still think it’s weird that I know it.
“I heard that!”
“Stay out of my head!” that got my sister to come up.
“Bro, you all right?” Wow, she never asks me things like that.
“Yah sis, everything’s fine.” For a moment, there was silence, then the sound of feet going down the stairs.
“Great, now my family thinks I’m crazy!” I felt like screaming.
“You probably are.” I turned around to see that Tonya was pressing her fore head against the mirror. “Think about it, they can’t see me, only you can. That does make you sound a bit crazy.” I hate to admit it, but she has a point.
“Ha! You admitted it!” I scowled at her.
“Did not!” She stuck her tongue out.
“Did too!” I threw my hands up in the air and went into the bathroom.
“Hey, where you going?” Tonya asked.
“To shower. I need to think.” After leaving the room, I felt like I was finally at piece. I wanted to stay in there forever, just to feel the way the warm water rushed over my body. It felt just like when--, no, that times gone. Getting out, I headed back to the closet and grabbed some clothes out, all the while trying to keep the towel wrapped around my waist.
“I can kind of see your, um.” I looked up to see Tonya crouched down and her head tipped sideways.
“Wha, why are you trying to look!” she shrugged.
“Trying to see how well you cover up. You’re very bad at it.” I was getting really annoyed now with her.
“Can you give me some privacy for a minute Tonya?” Compiling, Tonya turned around and allowed me to get dressed. Every now and then I swore she was peeking. When I was done, she turned around and went over to her bed and grabbed a pile of clothes off the bed.
“Now you need to give me some privacy.” Turning around, I could hear her getting dressed. I tried not to think about it, but I couldn’t really help it. “Hey! Stop that, it’s disgusting!” turning around, I saw that she was done changing and was pulling up her socks.
“Are you hungry?” I asked, still trying to be nice to her. Tonya shook her head.
“Not really, I haven’t gotten hungry at all.” That might be for the better. One less mouth to feed.
“Heard that ya know.” Damn.
The rest of the day went pretty normally, I hooked up the T.V., Hailey’s stereo and got no thanks from her. I helped mom with the yard work, and got the living room set up along with the kitchen. After that was done, I went down to the basement to put some boxes away, when I saw that there was a sheet covering what looked like a couch. Taking it off, I was correct. It was a nice old couch that was in really great shape. Looking across from it, I saw that there was another sheet covering something else. Taking it down, I saw that the sheet was covering a huge, 55’ flat screen T.V. (What? Can’t a guy dream?)
“I thought you might like this room.” Turning around, I saw that mom was standing on the stairs, holding what looked like a key in her hand. “I already told Hailey that the T.V. stays down here.” Before I could thank her, she tossed me the key and went back upstairs. This was great. Later that night, mom told me that she was going to visit a friend for the night and was taking Hailey with her. Once they were gone, I went back down stairs and sat in my new man room and turned on the T.V. While I was down there, I felt a huge surge go through my body, it was the urge to pee. Running up the stairs, I headed for the door to get out, only to have my bladder release itself, making the front of my pants wet. Going back upstairs to my room, I saw that Tonya had just come from the bathroom.
“What the hell happened to you fat-head?”
“I just pissed the front of myself, that’s what happened.” I wasn’t in the mood to put up with her shit. Tonya looked from her bathroom and back at me.
“Can you sit down for a sec?” She asked pulling up a chair.
“Can’t I change first?” She shook her head. Sighing, I grabbed the chair that was at my desk and sat on it informally. “What do you want?”
“I think I just found out something.” Giving her a puzzled look, I sat there and waited for an answer. Tonya just sat there, looking relaxed. For a minute or two, she didn’t say anything at all. Then as I was about to get up, I felt a warmness spread all over the front of my pants. Looking down, I saw that I had pissed again. Looking over at Tonya, I could see a wet floor around her.
“What did you do?” I asked, still amazed by what she did. Tonya just looked at me and smiled.
I just found out something by this little experiment.” She was still grinning from ear to ear in a puddle of pee.
“What, that you have a sick mind?” What must have been going through her mind when she thought of this?
“I heard that! And I do not have a sick mind. What I found out is that I have complete control of your bodily functions. And I can make you piss yourself any time I want to.”
“Yeah, but you’d end up pissing yourself as well dumb ass.” Tonya stopped smiling and thought about this for a while. While she was thinking, I decided to get some new pants and underwear and head for the shower. When I got out, Tonya had cleaned her floor and changed, while my floor was still soaked. Throwing my soaked clothes into the dirty laundry pile, I went to cleaning my floor, while Tonya watched from behind the mirror.
“why did you do that?” I asked her. She didn’t answer for a second.
“Do what? Make you piss yourself the first or second?” she was getting a kick out torturing me.
“You bet I am! You make it to easy.”
“Stop reading my thoughts!” Tonya stuck her tongue out at me.
“I can’t fat head!” She still hadn’t answered my first question.
“Why did you make me, um.” I didn’t really want to say it.
“Piss yourself? I don’t really know.” I was getting really tired of her doing that. Looking at the clock, I noticed that it was around 9:54 PM.
“I’m going to bed.” Tonya just stared at me as I stripped to my boxers and climbed into bed.
“But it’s only nine, why do you want to go to bed?”
“Because talking to you was tiring. Why do I have to give you a reason?” After that, Tonya did the same thing.
“Good night Tony.” Good night Tonya. I didn’t really feel like using my mouth at the moment. That is one time that her being able to hear my thoughts being a good thing.

For the next couple of weeks, Tonya made my life a hell hole. Her and I would get into fights constantly, and end with me yelling at her. That would end up bringing mom up stairs and asking what was wrong. The fact that mom and Hailey couldn’t see or hear Tonya made my life even worse. Every time I tried to tell them or show them her, they would only say that they only see their reflections. That made them think that I was mentally. Mom took me to a phyciatrist a few times. They all said that I either had something inside me that I have bottled up, or that I was messed up in the head. At home, I tried to spend as little amount of time from my room. Today, I was confined in my room, for mom was told by the last guy who poked around in my head said that I needed to be isolated from people and to take these huge pills the size of my fist. Lying on my bed, I tried to think about how to get rid of Tonya, but every time I did, she would yell at me.
“Are you going to take that football yet?” She was referring to the blue pill on my desk.
“No.” Tonya was about to say something to make me take it, but before she could, I got up and took the pill into the bathroom and flushed it. When I got back in the room, She was scolding me like a mother.
“You were supposed to take that.” I smiled at her.
“I did, I took it to the toilet.” I could tell that she wanted to slap me, but thank god for the mirror. Going back to my bed, I could feel a strange tingling sensation all over my body. Looking back at Tonya, I saw that her eyes were shut and really concentrating. When she opened her eyes, she had a look of enjoyment on her face.
“What did you do?” She didn’t really answer me. What she did was laugh at me. Looking down, I was horrified. What I saw was long flowing pink sun dress with ruffles around the shoulder area.
“How did you do that?” Tonya stopped laughing her ass off long enough to answer.
“I don’t really know, but it suits you fat head.” That was the last straw. Going in the closet, I reached into my baseball bag and pulled out my bat. The sight of it stopped Tonya’s laughing completely.
“What are doing Tony?” I just stood in front of the mirror with the bat in hand. Looking as serious as possible.
“Change my clothes back, now.” Tonya shook her head, keeping her eyes on the bat.
“Change me back, or I smash the mirror.” A frightened look appeared on her face.
“You wouldn’t…”
“Try me.” Five whole minutes passed by before I felt the tingle that I felt before. Looking down, I saw that my clothes were back to the way that they were before.

“Thank you.” I said, putting the bat on my bed. Tonya wasn’t all too happy with me.
“Would you have actually smashed the mirror?” She sounded really scared. I shook my head and laughed.
“No, but it got you to change me back, didn’t it?” That made her mad. As I sat on my bed, I felt a warm feeling grow around the center of my pants.
“Damn it Tonya!” I looked over at Tonya to see how bad she wet herself, but she was completely dry.
“Why aren’t you wet?” Tonya looked down at her legs and then back up at me.
“I think I learned how to only make you wet. I think that might come in handy.” She walked over to her bed and sat down on.
“I think that you should start treating me a whole lot nicer from now on.” She still looked a bit mad. I just stood there, glaring at her.
“No.” Tonya rose to her feet and walked over to the mirror.
“What?” She heard me.
“I know I heard you, why not?” I went over to the closet and grabbed new clothes.
“Because I don’t like you and I think that you’re not real and that you’re just here to drive me insane. Well guess what? You did it. Now, since you have accomplished what you’re here for, I want you to leave, now!” Tonya looked as if she was about to say something but I interrupted her. “No, you don’t have any say in the matter. I want you gone now and to leave and never come back!” I felt really good after I said that. Looking at Tonya, I could see that tears were forming around her eyes. She was about to cry.
“No, don’t start that!” That didn’t really help. I think it made it worse for she started crying her eyes out. Not wanting to listen to her sobbing, I decided to go into the bathroom to change. While I was in there, I could still hear Tonya crying. As I was about to leave, the crying stopped. Getting out and going to the mirror, I saw what I would never see again.
Myself.
“She’s gone.” I checked the entire mirror, no signs of her. “She’s finally gone!” for the first time in weeks I had my room to myself. As I sat there, proud, I began to feel something swell up deep in my gut. I pondered what it was for some time, and then I realized what it was. Guilt, loneliness, I felt empty for some reason. Was it because she wasn’t here anymore? Getting out of bed, I walked over to the mirror and sat on the floor. I waited for her to pop up, laugh and call me a fat head. But she didn’t. For hours I sat in front of the mirror, waiting. But she never came. Hopping that she would show up in the morning, I decided to go to bed. As I lay there, I couldn’t help but feel terrible about what I did. Looking at the clock, I saw that it was around 3:00 in the morning, that’s when I felt it. There was something in my bed with me. Rolling over, what I saw, or, who I saw, was Tonya. She was curled up and clinging my arm. This was really weird. Tonya, the girl that lived in the mirror in my closet, was in my bed holding my arm. I didn’t really know what to think about this. I did know that I didn’t want her to let go and leave again. Putting my arm around her, I pulled her in tight and hugged her. She, the girl that I thought made me go nuts when she was around. But I was wrong. She was the girl who made me go nuts when she wasn’t around. As I held her, I felt her move slightly. When she opened her eyes, she seemed a bit spooked.
“How…” I cut her off.
“I’m sorry.” I said. “I didn’t mean what I said. I don’t hate you. I thought that when you were here only to make me mad and insane.” I looked up at her with tears in my eyes. “And when you left, I felt happy. But then, the longer you were gone, I felt sad and scared. I thought that with you gone, my life was going back to normal and I could live it again.” I buried my head in her chest. “But I realized that I couldn’t live without you. Without you, my life wouldn’t be normal. I want you to stay.” The flood gates opened and my tears fell out all over. After what seemed like an eternity, I felt her hand rub my back. Looking up, I saw tears in her eyes.
“That’s really sweat. And I don’t think that I could have been able to live my life without you either.” Taking my head, she placed it on her shoulder and stroked it. For the rest of the night, we stayed like that. Eventually I fell asleep in her arms.
That very morning, I felt great, like a great weight has left my body. As I opened my eyes, I felt a presence next to me. Looking up, I saw Tonya, still stroking my hair.
“Morning Tony.” She was smiling at me. “How did you sleep?” I smiled up at her.
“Like I haven’t sleep in all my life. What about you?” She kissed the top of my head and continued to stroke it.
“Like I finally got what I was missing back.” For a few hours we cuddled in my bed, and then we heard some footsteps coming up the stairs.
“CRAP!” We were both scared. Mom and Hailey could see or hear Tonya when she was ‘in’ the mirror, but what about out of the mirror? Getting out bed, Tonya, who was only in her bra and panties, ran for the mirror. Just as the door was opening, Tonya went through the mirror. I shall have to ask her about that later. When it opened all the way, mom came in with Hailey behind her, carrying a tray of food with her.
“Tony, are you okay?” Mom said, coming in without my permission. “We heard you yell.” Damn.
“No, everything’s fine.” Hailey walked up to me and placed the tray on my desk.
“Did we hear a girl in here?” Crap, they can hear her.
“No, it might have been the T.V.” I lied, pointing to the turned off T.V. set. Looking at it and me again, both Hailey and mom left the room. When I was sure that they were gone, I went over to the mirror to check up on Tonya, who was hiding behind her bed.
“That was to close.” I said as she came out from hiding. “Tonya, I have to ask you something, how did you get out of the mirror?” Tonya shrugged her shoulders.
“I don’t know. After what you said to me last night, I felt as if I didn’t have any reason to exist, and I could feel myself fade away. As I was fading, I felt that you were upset, and you wanted me back. And that’s all I remember. I don’t really know how I got in your bed.”
“Can you get out now?” Tonya shrugged.
“I’ll try.” Watching her, I could see that she really wanted to get out. And I really want her to be able to get out as well. Concentrating, Tonya walked towered the mirror and pressed her body on the glass. What we thought would hold her back; she went through like it was water. Catching her before she fell, I pulled her into a hug.
“For a second there, I thought that I would never hold you again.” Tonya hugged me back.
“I as well.”

For the next couple months, I and Tonya became really close. I think I spent less and less time in my ‘man room’, and more time in my room. Tonya started to spend more time in my room than her room ever since she found out she could get out of the mirror.
As time went on, she learned how to do many other things as well. She learned how to change her form, as well as other people’s form also. I’ve spent some time as a girl for some time, and it was pretty fun. Every now and then, she would turn me into a really fluffy wolf and use me as a pillow when we slept. I didn’t really mind it at all; it actually felt really nice to have her laying on me. Whenever I came entered the bed room after I left home, she would pounce on me. We still had are fights. But they never lasted long. She still calls me fat head.
Eventually, mom found someone to be with too.
His name was Mark Garver. He was a construction worker that did some work on are house from time to time. They have been dating for as long as Tonya and I have. He was a really nice guy, when he was sober. When he was sober, he was the nicest guy ever. He would take a bullet for you. But when he was drunk, he would be the one to fire the bullet.
There have been times when I almost met the ‘Garvanator’ on his drunk run. Then, one day, I didn’t get out in time.
I was at a friend’s house for most of the day. When I got home, I met Mark at the door, with a beer bottle in hand.
“Where have you been boy?” He asked, the beer rolled off his tongue. I looked up at him with fear, but I stood my ground.
“At a friend’s house.” I noticed that his arm was bandaged up from the wrist to the shoulder. That must have added to his anger. “Did you just get off work?” Mark waved the beer bottle in my face.
“That is an affirmative. So, why are you late? Your mom said that you’d be home by eight.”
I looked at him with an odd face.
“It’s only 8:10. I’m only ten minutes late.” That wasn’t enough for Mark in his drunken state.
“I think it’s time for you to learn about being on time.” He started to walk to me.
“Where’s mom?” Mark laughed as he took another drink.
“Out.” Before I could get away, Mark grabbed my arm tight and pulled me into the house. Once I was inside, Mark closed in on me. Reaching for his belt, Mark brought it across my face, the belt siring my skin. Mark continued to beat me with his belt all over my body. When he was done with that, he grabbed the collar of my shirt and lifted me up. I didn’t like what he did next.
Mark was strong; he had to since he was a construction worker. Using the back of his right hand, Mark did the all powerful bitch slap across my face. Going back in forth, Mark mercilessly beat my head to a pulp. After that, he went to beating my gut with his fist over and over. I could feel my lung go up into my head. With my body beaten and bloody, Mark let me drop to the floor with a thud.
“Now go think about what you learned.” I left as soon as I could, for fear that he would change his mind. Reaching my room, I found Tonya waiting by the door. When she saw me, I looked like she saw a ghost.
“Oh my god! Tony, what happened?” She reached her arm out for me to take hold of. Using her other arm, Tonya wrapped her arm around me, causing me to wince in pain. Taking to the bathroom, Tonya stripped me of my clothes and placed me in the tub. I was amazed how well she was doing this. She wasn’t embarrassed by the fact that I was naked in front of her. Turning the water on, Tonya let the warm water run over my sore, beaten limp body. It felt good to have the water flow over my wounds.
“What happened to you?” She asked while she cleaned my face.
“Mark, he was drunk again. Said that I was late and decided to beat a lesson in me.” Tonya had a look of great sadness on her face. Once I was clean, she took me out of the tub and went to drying off. When she reached my crouch, I got a little horny. Tonya noticed this. She smiled but kept drying me off till there was not a drop of water on my body.
After that she took me into the bedroom and placed me onto the bed. Going into the closet, Tonya grabbed a pair of boxers and slipped them on me. After that she pulled the covers over me. Tonya had learned to change the appearance of the body not too long ago. She could make it look like I had no cuts or and wounds at all, but the pain I felt would still be there. She was about to do so when the door started to open. Tonya jumped into the mirror before it was opened up all the way to reveal mom in a party dress.
“Tony?” Mom turned on the light to reveal the marks that I had all over my body. Mom was frightened at the sight. “Honey, who did this to you?” She was really scared for me.
“Mark.” Is all I said. Moms look of fear left her face.
“Oh, did he have a reason?” She didn’t seem to worried about the fact that her boyfriend beat the ever-living-shit out of me.
“He said it was because I was ten minutes late.” Mom just sat beside me for a minute. It looked like she was thinking. When she answered, I was shocked by what she said.
“Well, maybe you disserved it. Maybe you’ll learn not to be late next time.” After she said that, she told me that Mark was taking her to a fancy dinner for the night. She said that Hailey would be here if I needed anything. A few minutes after mom left, Hailey came into the room with a cold ice pack and a bottle of water.
“Hey, Tony, how ya feeling?” Hailey never acted this nice to me before.
“Maybe she knows that what happened was wrong and wants to make you feel better.” Tonya said, still behind the mirror. Hailey sat on the bed and placed the Ice on my forehead.
“I don’t think that what Mark did was right. If he wanted to punish you, he’d take that mirror away from you.” That got my attention. Did she know about Tonya?
“What are you talking about Hailey? Why the mirror?” Hailey shook her head and poked the cut on my cheek, brining a scream from me.
“I’m not stupid Tony. I know that there’s something about that mirror that you don’t tell us.” She went over to it and placed her hand on it. “So, what is it?” Would telling her be a help me?
“It might. She could be more helpful with her knowing.” Tonya was trying to stay behind the mirror. She really wanted to jump out. Well, since she has some clue, might as well have her come out.
“Tonya, come on out.” With those words, Tonya stepped out of the mirror. I thought the sight of a girl coming out of a mirror would scare the ever living crap out of her, but it didn’t. She stood there with her trademark emotionless face.
“So, that’s what you’ve been hiding. That’s a big secret.” She’s taking it well.
“I tried to tell you guys before, but you didn’t believe me.” Hailey looked down at me on the bed with her blank face.
“Sorry. So, what’s her name?”
“Tonya.” Hailey went up to her and shook her hand.
“It was very nice to meat you. Are you taking good care of num-nuts over there?” Hailey asked, referring to me. Tonya smiled and nodded her head.
“Yeah, you don’t have to worry about anything. You go get some sleep and I’ll take good care of him.” Before Hailey left, she gave me a kiss on the head and went down stairs to her room. Once she was gone, Tonya came over and went on to healing the marks on my body.
“That should take care of your bruises. But the pain will still be there.” She stroked the hair in front of my face.
“I don’t really mind as long as I have you.” Tonya smiled her sweet smile. Just as she was about to leave, I took hold of her arm.
“Please, stay.” Tonya didn’t say anything. She just smiled and crawled in next to me. For a while, Tonya stroked my hair and hummed. I felt safe with her, like she was a second mother to me. I was always told that men look for women to marry that reminded them of their mothers. Tonya didn’t remind me of anything about my mom. Tonya was better.
“Tonya.” I asked. “Can you tell me who you are?” Tonya stopped what she was doing and looked down at me.
“I don’t think you want to know.”
“But I do want to know.” Tonya sighed and went back to stroking my hair.
“All right. I am you. A part of you. I am your most curious thoughts.” I didn’t quite understand, but I still listened. “When you came to this house, you had many things on your mind. The mirror sensed that. The mirror makes your strongest thoughts come to life. What came out of you was me.” That made sense I guess.
After some time, I fell asleep in Tonya’s arms. It felt nice to be in her arms. As I sleep, my thoughts went wild.
****Dream world****
Sitting in the living room, I watched T.V. as Tonya sat next to me in my lap. Tonya looked at me with a very seductive look in her eyes. I had a good feeling about this. Moving in to kiss her, The front door opened to reveal Mark with mom behind him.
“Well, well, what do we have here?” I was speechless. Marked walked over to Tonya and grabbed her by the neck. “This is a very nice little piece of meat you got boy.” He took her to the middle of the living room. “But, I don’t think you should deserve such a girl like this.” Taking his hand, Mark went on to beating her. I tried to get up to stop him, but I couldn’t get off the couch. Looking at the couch, I saw hands pulling me back down on it. I sat there helplessly as Mark beat Tonya to death. As he was doing so, mom came up next to me and placed a hand on my shoulder.
“It’s for the best.” She had a blank look to her face, like Hailey’s face, only worse. Soon after Mark was done, Hailey came down the stairs with the mirror in hand. She had a collar around her neck.
“Good girl.” Mark took the mirror from her and gave her what looked like a dog treat. Setting the mirror up, Mark took Tonya and threw her into the mirror with great force. Taking the mirror, Mark smashed it on the ground. I felt my heart tear in two. I could see Tonya in the shards of glass. Mark the gathered the glass shards up and thrown them into the fire. I sat there with tears in my eyes as I watched the glass melt with Tonya in them.
****Real world****
Bolting up in pain, I was sweating pools onto the bed. Tonya wasn’t in my bed. Getting scared, I fell out of bed. The sound of my fall must have got the attention of Tonya, for she came out of the mirror. She must have wanted to let me sleep.
“Tony, what’s wrong?” She bent down and held me to her chest. “What happened?” I was happy that she was alright, but the dream was still in my mind.
“I, I had a nightmare.” Tonya looked down at me and kissed my head.
“What was it about?” I spent the next half hour telling her what my nightmare was about. When I was done, Tonya’s face was pale.
“Tony, it was only a nightmare, nothing more. That would never happen.” As she held me, I began to smell something awful. Then I felt something squish in the back of my pants. I started crying. I couldn’t help it. Tonya noticed this and embraced me tighter, but I felt no pain. Letting me go, Tonya went into the bathroom and brought out a towel and laid it on the floor. Moving me onto the towel, Tonya proceeded to take my pants and boxers off, which were filled with crap. Putting them aside, Tonya went in the closet and came out with a diaper and wipes.
“Your sister left them in there a few weeks ago. She might have done it because of all the times I made you wet yourself.” That’s right; Hailey was the one who did the laundry in the house. So she must have thought that something was wrong. Leaving them there must have been her way of helping.
Placing the extremely thick diaper under me, Tonya took out the wipes and cleaned my bottom. The whole time, I was really embarrassed.
“Don’t be embarrassed, I’m doing this so you don’t make a mess later tonight to be on the safe side.” I had to agree with her on that part. When she was done, Tonya lifted me up and helped me onto the bed. On the way to the bed, I could feel the thickness of the diaper between my legs.
Looking behind me, I could see that with the diaper on, it made my butt stick out about a good foot. Getting me on the bed, Tonya went back into the closet and came out with out of my boxers. Using her powers, Tonya made them into an onesie sleeper. Putting it on me, Tonya crawled into bed and lay with me. I thought that the sleeper was not really needed, but I didn’t say anything.
For the rest of the night, we slept together in my bed. I didn’t have any more nightmares that night. For the first time in years, I’ve been able to sleep. For the first time in years, I was truly happy.

You know what I hate? Moving. We just recently moved into a new house. Sounds like fun right? Wrong! My new home was the home of a dead girl that lived here about two months ago. I’m getting ahead of myself.
My name is Justin Fletcher. I’m 16 and I live with my sister at my Aunts new home. My parents died about a year ago and my sister Rika and I have lived with are Aunt since then. She’s a nice lady, she’s about twenty seven, she was moms ‘younger’ sister. My Aunts old home didn’t have enough room for a 16 year old boy and a 14 year old girl to live in. that’s when My Aunt, Judy, found the house we now live in.
The house was an old one. Filled with cobwebs, spiders, dust and old things that should have become the dust. The house was up for about two months before we bought it. And we got it for real cheap to. The guy who sold it to us didn’t say why. It’s been a couple weeks since we’ve move in, me and Rika got enrolled into the school nearby and will be starting when summers over. Rika has already made a good number of friends, while I only have about three.
Anyway, at the moment, I’m sitting my room, boxes are everywhere, with me lying on my bed tossing an orange ball in the air and then catching it. I tried to get up and put stuff away, but that would require work, and me being the lazy teen I am, didn’t really want to get up. So I went back to playing with the ball. Before we started moving things in, I did a bit of research on the house. It turns out that this house had only one owner before us.
A family whose daughter died in her room, my room. After the daughter died, the parents left and put the house for sale. No one bought it for over two months, since they said that they have been seeing things move.
I didn’t really believe any of it. That night, when I was going to sleep, I felt a weird presence in the room. Ignoring it, I went back to sleep. After what seemed like hours, I awoke to a voice in the room. It sounded like a girl’s voice.
Looking at the foot of the bed, I saw that I was right. There was a girl in the room. She looked a bit short, but then I saw that she was floating about three feet off the floor with her legs crossed, looking at me. The thing that stood out the most about her was that she was transparent. I could see the wall behind her. The next thing I did, I’m not very proud of. I fell out of the bed yelling ‘HOLY SHIT!’ When I landed, I hit my head on the floor. Seeing me land on my head must have been funny to her, for she started laughing.
“That wasn’t funny.” I said. What I said must have startled the girl. Uncrossing her legs, she floated above my head.
“Can you see me?” I nodded my head. The girl seemed to scream with joy at my jester. “Finally, I have someone to talk to!” I was really confused.
“Huh? What are you talking about?” The girl came down and sat on the bed.
“Right, I guess I should explain first. My name is Katie; I used to live here about two months ago. But when I died, my parents were really sad about it and wanted to leave, for my death really hurt them. The day that they were leaving, I tried to get their attention by moving things around. But that made them leave faster. Ever since then, people never come in the house. When people do, they don’t stay long, for I try to get their attention, but that just scares them.” She looked up and looked me in the eyes.
“You’re the first person to be able to see and hear me. It gets really boring here when you can’t really talk to anyone.” Wow, this was a lot to take in. I just met a ghost of the girl who died in this very room, and the first thing she wants to do is talk?
“So,” I start. “How old are you?” Katie looked at me and smiled.
“17. How about you?” I gave her a smile, trying to stay friendly.
“16. by the way, my names Justin.” Katie smiled and jumped off the bed and, what looked like walking, went to the end of the bed.
“Well Justin, it seems that I’m a year older than you.” I was getting scared now.
“And that means what?” Katie just kept smiling at me.
“I don’t know. I just felt like saying it.” She laughed. Great, I’m stuck with a ghost that thinks she’s funny.
“Okay Katie, can I ask you something?” Katie nodded her head and sat back down on the bed, her ghost butt going through the bed slightly. “Can you, like, do things that ghost can do?” That was a really dumb question. Katie sat there and thought about it for some time.
“I don’t really know. I can move small things like ash trays and small books. I can’t touch many things. When I try to close a door, I go right through it.”
“Can you possess people?” Katie bolted up and looked at me with the biggest, goofiest grin ever.
“I never tried it before; do you want to give it a shot?” Wow she was impulsive.
“Yeah sure, why not?” Giggling, Katie went above my head and lowered herself inside of me. As she did this, I got a very strong tingling feeling all over my body, like when your leg falls asleep. When the tingling stopped, I could feel myself move into the back of my mind, but I could still see out my eyes.
“Justin?” I heard my body say.
“Katie?” I heard my body scream with delight.
“Yay, it worked! I’m you!” Well, she’s happy.
“Katie, can you hear me?” I felt my head nod.
“Yeah. This is so cool!” With Katie in control, all I could do is sit in the passenger seat of my mind while Katie drives. “It feels good to be alive again!” Katie moved my hands all over my body. Feeling every muscle I had. “You have a really nice body.” Katie then got an idea. “Can I sleep with you to night?”
“What?” Katie jumped up and down.
“Please! I’ll get out of your body in the morning, I promise.” I guess I had no other choice.
“Fine, just, no exploring.” Katie giggled and jumped in the bed.
“Good night Justin.”
“Good night Katie.” For the rest of the night, Katie sleeps in my body. She told me that since she was a ghost, she couldn’t sleep. So this must have been nice for her. As I sit there in the back of my mind, I could feel myself get tiered and pass out.
The next morning, Katie was out of my body. I knew she was, for I tried to kill my alarm clock when it went off. Finally unplugging it, I rolled over meet Katie’s gaze who was floating above my face.
“Gah! Don’t do that!” Katie Laughed as she floated down beside me.
“Sorry.” She was doing a good imitation of lying down, when she really would have just went through the bed.
“How long were you watching me?” Katie shrugged.
“I don’t know. Did you know that you snore like a heard of dying hippos?” That was new to me.
“No, I didn’t know that.” Getting out of bed, I proceeded to the kitchen where my Aunt and Rika were eating breakfast. Seeing how they weren’t screaming or yelling, I don’t think they can see Katie.
“Hey Aunt Yuri (okay, I know what you’re going to say, but, don’t) what’s for breakfast?” Aunt Yuri looked up from her plate and smiled at me.
“Eggs and bacon dear. Theirs a plate on the counter.” Getting a plate, I proceeded to get my food, while Katie sat on the counter.
“I haven’t had eggs and bacon in forever!” She said, trying to sniff my food.
“Katie, this is my food.” I whispered to her. She got her puppy dog eyes on.
“Please? Can I have some?” Sighing, I asked Aunt Yuri if I could take my food to my room.
“Okay, just don’t make a mess.” Agreeing, I took the food to my room with Katie trailing in tow. Once inside, I placed the food on the bed and stood in front of Katie.
“Okay, get it over with.” Not wasting anytime, Katie takes my body and begins to chow down the food. I watched as Katie devoured the food in less than a minute.
“That was delicious! You have to thank your Aunt for me.”
“Sure, can I have my body back now?” Katie sighed.
“Fine, I suppose.” Leaving my body, Katie sat on the bed, displeased.
“What’s wrong?” Katie gave me a humph.
“I just really want a body again. It’s fun to be human from time to time, but I want to be alive again!” I had to feel sad for her. She has only been alive for about two times. I imagine that she wants it full time.
“I’m sorry, I didn’t know. What if I help to get your body back?” I didn’t have time to add on before Katie pounced me.
“Oh thank you Justin!” What might have been a pounce, turned into going right through me. When she went through me, it felt like when she took me over. After Katie finally realized that wasn’t in the same room anymore, she came back in, giggling.
“Sorry, I forgot that I couldn’t really hold you yet.” She was laughing to herself. I couldn’t help but laugh with her. For some time I thought about what she said about how she couldn’t hold me yet. Does that mean that she likes me? I decided not to ask her about that.
“So, um, I know a guy who is into things like this. Ya know things that don’t really happen all the time.” Katie looked at me with a bit of curiosity.
“Who?”
“Tony Vladimore.” Katie had a blank stare on her face.
“Never heard of him.” I laughed.
“I would think that you would have. He’s lived here for over a year and went to your school.” Katie still had a blank look. It was kind of funny. “Well, I’ll go talk to him today, see if he can help.”
I did what I said that I would, after I took a shower and had Katie pestering me the whole time about how I don’t clean the right way. The whole time I tried to tell her to get out, she finally did once I was done. Later that day, I decided to call Tony and ask him to meet me at the library around twelve. While I waited, Katie was asking me a lot of random questions.
“What’s this Tony guy like?” I thought about it for a while.
“He’s, a bit odd at times. Once you get to know him, he’s really normal.” That wasn’t enough to satisfy her curiosity, so she kept asking questions. When Tony finally arrived, he had Tonya with him.
“Hey Justin.” Tony said once he reached us.
“Hey Tony, Tonya.” I said to the both of them. “I have a bit of a problem.” I looked up at Katie who was floating above my head. Tony was looking at the same spot.
“Who’s she?”
“Wait, you can see her?” Tony nodded. Tonya was looking at the same spot as well.
“Yeah, she’s as clear as day.” Katie squealed with delight.
“Yay! More people who can see me!” Tonya laughed while Katie did some spins.
“She seems to be a happy ghost. What would you need help with?” I sighed and told Katie to come down.
“I need your help to get her body back.” Tony looked at me with disbelief.
“I’m sorry; did you say that you want us to help you get her body back? That is very hard to do.” Tonya tapped Tony’s shoulder and pulled him aside. After she was done talking to him, they came back with Tony very unhappy.
“Tonya might know someone who can help.” Katie flew over in front of Tonya.
“WHO? PLEASE TELL ME!” She was very excited. Tonya had to back up a bit before Katie went through her.
“She’s a gypsy. She helps me from time to time with some stuff. She may be able to help you.” Before I could ask where this gypsy was, Katie possessed my body and gave Tonya a hug.
“Okay, this is a bit weird.” Tony said.
“Katie! Can I have my body back?” Katie shook my head. “Then can you ask where the gypsy lives?”
“Oh, right, Justin wants to know where the gypsy lives.” After Tony gave us the directions, the four of us went out for some fun, the whole time Katie had my body. Soon after, Katie and I left Tony and Tonya and went home. I knew what Tonya was and what she and Tony were going to do when they got home.

That night, Katie and I went out to the area that Tonya said she would be. As we traveled, I noticed the dirt road that Tonya said the gypsy would be down. After some time, we finally reached a small trailer that was covered in vines and flowers. Katie, who was floating beside me, noticed that a woman was sitting on the outside of the building.
“Can I help you two children?” She said with a craggily voice.
“You can see Katie?” The woman nodded.
“Yes, and I also know why you have come to me as well.” The woman beckoned for the two of us to follow her inside. When inside, I was amazed to see that it looked much better than the outside did.
“Now let’s see what we can do about your body.” The woman said. Getting out a deck of cards, she placed three on the table and started to speak. “The young lady here lost her body due to a car running her over.” She flipped the first card over to show a car. “And then she met you in the night, wanting help.” She flipped over the next card to show a girl floating in front of a boy. “And then you want to get your body back so you can be with him.” She pulled out another card from the deck, showing the room that we were in.
She took out one more card. “The way to get the girl’s body back is to give up your pride.” She said pointing at me. Flipping over the card, it showed a girl in boy’s clothes. I didn’t really get it but I wanted to stay with what I told Katie.
“I’ll do it.”

111112.content:
As he ran through the field, he could hear a whole heard of Genprey, feeding on the dead carcass of a Popo, a large mammoth like monster with short legs and massive tusks. Genprey are like raptors, only bigger. Their skin is a deep green color and on their head is blade like horns. ‘This is great. A whole pack of Gen, just waiting to be picked off.’ Zack was one of the best hunters that the town of Shell Shine has ever seen. He could take down a Tigerex within minutes and not break a sweat. As he approached the Gen, Zack pulled out his sword, and waited in the brush, waiting for the Genprey to finish their meal. Zack always lets any monster finish the food they eat before attacking. But this was not a job that he could be polite on. He had a time limit and he was almost out of time. Zack, with his sword ready, leaped out of the brush and ran towered Gen with his blade held high. From the sound Zack made, the Genprey looked up to see him. Without thinking, the pack ran toward Zack, hoping to overpower him. But that was not the case, for He was hoping that they would go for him, rather than run. Swinging his sword, Zack landed a good amount of solid hits on the pack. As three Genprey fall, only one was left standing, the smallest Gen. ‘This guy is hurt already, may as well take him.’ The Gen before him was still trying to fight, which did it little good. Zack moved away from the Gen, and pulled out a Soul-gem and attached it to his scanner gauntlet and activated the soul steal program. Within seconds, the Gen was trapped within the stone, turning it into a summon.
The town of Shell Shine was a large town, but also a poor town. It manly makes its money from tourists and selling the summons that is collected from hunters. In the center of the town was the school. This school was for children that could use the powers of summons without the summon out. Zack was one of those kids. He could call on the power of any summon to aid him. But there was one thing different about him. He had powers of his own. Zack was about 5’ not that built, but strong considering the way he looks. His was born with dark green long hair that he keeps in a braid most of the time. The sword on his back was called éxtasis, the rapture. As he entered Shell Shine, Zack noticed a man at the gates. ‘Crap.’ “Zack, how good to see you. How goes the killing?” Zack sighed, pulling a cart up. “That’s great,” the man said, running over to see the kill. “How much trouble did they give you?” Zack still said nothing, for he knew what was coming next. The man shrugged his head and smiled at the Gen, only for his grin to go down. “Where is the fifth Genprey?” Zack didn’t answer. Instead, he pulled out a stone, it glowed bright red. “Why did you do that? I told you I wanted them all dead!” The man kicked the carts wheel, hurting his foot. “You can forget your pay!” This got Zack talking. “I took this job because I need the money. I didn’t know you needed the whole pack!” the man laughed. “You should have thought about that sooner.” The man thought for a minute, then got an idea. “How’s this, you give me the summon, and I give you half the pay.” Zack looked down at the stone and shook his head. “No deal.” The man shrugged. “Your loss.” With that, the man left the town with the pack of Gen. Inside the town, Zack went to a store, and this was no ordinary store, it was for hunters. Inside was nothing special. The floor was dirt, and the shelves were filled with Soul-gems of many colors. “John, you in?” Zack was eager to get home, but he had to get some things done. “Yeah, in the back.” Behind the counter, was a doorway that was covered by a curtain, Johns work space. Coming out, Zack could get a better look at him. John was a fat man, and a happy one. He had that look to him that he could never be pissed, and the big white beard did little to help. “What can I do for you Zack?” Zack smiled and pulled out the summon. “Caught a Gen while on duty, thought that it could make a rookie happy.” John took the stone, eyeing it from every angle. “I’ll take a look at it. Tell your mom I said hi.” “Will do.” And he headed off.
Zack’s house wasn’t very special; it was mostly a one-story house, with two bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a monster living room. As Zack walked in, he could smell food being made. ‘Moms cooking, this can’t be good.’ Going into the kitchen, he saw his mother cooking by the stove. Trying to sneak up on her, Zack went over, only to have a roller smack him on the head. “Ow, what was that for?” he asked. “For trying to sneak up on your mother.” Zack’s mother turned around to show what she was cooking. Zack’s mom name is Cait. She is taller than Zack, but not by much. Her hair was green too, but a lighter color than his. She was a sweet woman; she would do anything for you. And when Zack was little, she was like a mother bear taking on a tank to protect her cub. And she would win. There was on thing about her that made her different then other woman, she was a Mother-stone. On top of her head was a cute pair of green cat ears that could hear Zack in all parts of the house. And to get this out of the way, she does have a tail. “I am making your favorite honey,” Cait said, pulling a tray from the stove. “Pie!” Zack’s eyes lit up when he saw it. He was wondering if it was the exact type of pie. “Is it..” Cait nodded. “Yes, I baked some catnip into it. And for a overpowering smell, I sprinkled a bit of that Egyptian catnip on the top. Just the way you like it.” Because Cait is a Mother-stone, and a cat girl, her love for cat things were transferred to Zack when he was born. He got her genes. “Yah! Can’t wait for it!” Cait smiled. She loved to see her boy happy since he had one of the most difficult chooses. Today was the anniversary of when he lost his arm and leg. “Go wash up and be back down here in ten.” Zack nodded and rushed up twored the bathroom. Cait was glad that he was happy. It’s sad that he has to go back to school in a couple weeks. Later, after dinner, Zack went in the kitchen to help her mom wash dishes when Cait stopped. “What’s wrong mom?” Cait closed her eyes, trying to hold back the tears. “I know why you have been taking all those jobs from your uncle.” Zack was shocked. How did she know? “Why did you do them? What did you kill today?” Zack felt ashamed. He knew that this was going to happen. “A pack of Genprey. He said they have been killing live stock and scaring people.” “And were they?” Zack said nothing. Cait felt torn that her brother would do this. “Honey, why did you take the jobs?” Zack was on the verge of tears. “I heard that you needed the money or we will have to move. And you love this house.” Cait now felt sorry for Zack, for he was getting himself involved with her problems. “Honey, you’re a child, you don’t have to get yourself tangled up in this, and you just need to make your life the way you want.” Cait said as she hugged him. Zack was shocked about what she said. But she is right. He needs be a kid, and he hasn’t done that for a year. Zack decided to start that now and embraced her hug. Cait was surprised that Zack was hugging her back, but felt that he needed it. “How about some pie?” Zack nodded. Getting up, Cait got up and went to the kitchen, happy that Zack was now sharing what he kept bottled up. After getting the pie, Zack could smell it and began to drool. “And when you’re done, I got something that you will like.” Zack looked up at her and got curious about what she got. “You can get it when you’re done eating.” Zack nodded and looked down at his piece, and started to devourer it, getting pie all over his face. When he was done, Cait cleaned his face like the way she used to, with her tongue. He hated the fact that she was cleaning him, but he wanted to make her happy. “Now that your clean, I have something for you.” Zack was about to ask when she took out her necklace. Her necklace had a stone in the center. “What’s that for?” Cait smiled. “To awaken the true you. Your now old enough to handle the power of shape shifting into your true form.” Zack was confused; he was the son of a human and a Mother-stone, what could be his true form? As he pondered, Cait was placing it on his head and saying something that he didn’t catch. By the time he found out what was going on, a bright flash of light engulfed the room. Zack could feel a strong pain in his side as it moves to the rest of his body. When the light was gone, he could barely see do to the fact that of the flash. When his sight came back, the first thing he noticed is that the room was bigger. Zack was normally 5 feet tall, but he seemed shorter. Looking down, he noticed that his pants had fallen to the floor and his shirt covered his body. “Mom, what did you do?” Cait was behind the couch, with a mirror in hand. Getting down to his level, she held the mirror in front of him to show him what he looked like. Zack nearly fell over if it wasn’t for his mother. Zack was now 3 feet tall, and looked like a cat. His hair was still dark green, but it was now in a ponytail. His skin was now fur, and it was a deep white. His hands, now paws, were big. What he was more curious about, was why he had two long locks of hair coming out from the top of his head. “What are these things?” he asked, now noticing that his voice was higher. Cait just smiled. “Those are your antennas; they allow you to do more than you could.” Zack was confused, but that went away when he saw that he could move them like he moves his arms. “Now,” Cait said, getting Zack back to reality. “For your surprise.” Zack stood up and walked over to her. “What, I thought this was it?” Cait smiled even bigger. “No, this is.” Pulling out a bag from behind her back, which got Zack to smell it. And when he did, he jumped up and hug his mother in the most affectionate way ever since was ten. Dumping the contents of the bag, Cait turned into her true form. This was a bigger, female version of Zack. Looking at the floor, Zack noticed that the stuff that was in the bag was catnip. Cait sat on the couch as he rolled around in the plant and rubbed it all over himself.
Later, after Zack was done, the two decided to sit on the couch and watch TV. “Mom,” Cait looked down at him. “Will I stay like this?” Cait shook her head. “No, this is your chibi form, just like summons. Your human shape is your resting form, and you have another form. But I want you to find out what you look like yourself.” Zack crawled over to his mother and laid his head on her lap. “Will I have ears in my human form?” Cait shrugged. “Maybe, if you let them. And If you want, you can keep you antennas out as well. It is all your choice.” Zack nodded. He liked being like this, but he has a job to do, and school, and his friends. Before he could think of anything else, his eyes began to close. Soon, he’s off to sleep. Cait looked down at him and smiled. ‘He looks so cute.’ But then she frowned. ‘But he has his life to think about. I can’t keep him in my arms all the time.’ She saw him curl up into a ball and clutched her dress, like a child. ‘But just for tonight, let’s let him live a nice childhood.’ And with that, she carried him to her room, where she and Zack slept for the rest of the night.

Early the next morning, Zack awoke, with a splitting head ach. Looking around, he noticed that this wasn’t his room, it was his mothers. Getting out of bed, he realized that his pants were on the bed post, not on his body. Quickly getting them on, Zack went downstairs to find his mom watching TV with a bowl of cereal. “Hello dear, how did you sleep?” Cait said without looking away from the TV. “Damn those ears.” He mumbled to himself. “I heard that.” ‘That’s not good.’ Sitting on the couch, Zack found a massive amount of catnip on the floor. “Mom, why is there catnip…” “On the floor?” she interrupted him. He nodded. “You had a lot of fun last night, you should practice going into all your forms at some time.” Cait was still looking at the TV, munching away. Zack was scared. “So, that wasn’t a dream?” Cait shook her head. “Nope.” This was too much for Zack to take as he soon passed out. Cait looked at him and shrugged. Getting up, she went to the cumbered and grabbed a leaf of catnip and held it under Zack’s nose. This did the trick, for he started to rub it all over his face. “Now that you’re awake, you should go get ready for work.” He forgot all about work. “And you have a message on your cell, it’s from Mr. Raven, says he has a job for you.” “Thanks mom.” As Zack got ready, he could feel his head pound, which is probably from his ears wanting to come in. As much as he tried, he couldn’t hold them back anymore. Zack closed his eyes, hoping that if he can’t see it, they won’t hurt. But what came in weren’t his ears, it was his antennas. The two, hair covered antennas that he controlled. “Damn.” “NO CUSSING IN THIS HOUSE!!!” Cait yelled from the couch. “Sorry mom.” With any luck, he could go on with his head like this. Once he was finished, Zack started to put his hair in a braid when Cait stepped in. “Your antennas don’t go with a braid, they go with your pony tail you had last night.” Not wanting to make her mad, for she had his hair in her hand, she puts his hair up and into a pony tail. And Zack had to admit, it did look alright, but it kinda made him look a bit girly. After she was done, Zack said goodbye and left. Only to come back in seconds later to grab his sword.
As Zack walked, he thought about last night. ‘Was it all real? And can I do it again?’ Rounding the corner, Zack saw his destination, his office. Zack spent most of his time here, in what used to be an old church, now renovated to accommodate for his needs. Upon entering, he noticed a man in his chair, but he was unable to see his face. Being Zack, who normally gets defensive first and then ask, pulls out éxtasis and pointed it at what he thought to be the man’s head. “Whoa, calm down son, it’s me.” Zack, no realizing who it was, felt a bit embarrassed about what he did. “How did you get in here? I locked the door.” The man chuckled lifting a key. “Oh, right.” Zack felt very small now (no pun), he had just raised his blade to his friend. “Zack,” He started. “did you get my message?” Zack nodded. “Yeah, so what’cha got for me Raven?” Mr. Raven smiled. He was an assertive man, tall, normally has a fine suit on, light brown hair, and eyes that could stop a mad gunner.
“Call me Mr. Raven”
“Right….”
“Your job is your average bodyguard thing.”
“Damn, why a C-rank job?”
Mr. Raven sighed. “This isn’t a C-rank; it’s a A-rank.” This got Zack interested. Why would a bodyguard job be an A-rank level? “What is it? Big boss, a dealer, who?” Mr. Raven smile left his face as he pulled out a sheet of paper. “This note was pinned to my door last night, saying that a girl needs your help. She’s being followed by-“Zack interrupted him. “This is a job for the cops.” Mr. Raven handed him the note. “She being followed my some monsters. She has been a target for wild monsters, some summons, and a few half breeds.” Zack thought about this for a monument. “If you do it, this client will pay you big time.” This got Zack going. “I’ll do it!” Mr. Raven smiled, handing Zack a box. “Good, and also, a package was on your door step.” Zack looked at it with interest. Opening it, he could smell fresh cleaning supplies inside. Looking in, Zack eyes got big. His guns are back from the smith. Zack took pride in his weapons, but was really proud of his guns. A friend, before he died, made these two guns for him. A custom made job that was payment for Zack helping him. The guns were named the black and blue roses. Each gun looked like a old time six shooter, but had a custom grip, and double barrels. “How was last night?” Mr. Raven was making a martini at the bar only for him. “Good, had a strange thing happen last night.” Zack said as he put his guns on the table. “Oh, is that why you have bangs that go out of your head and a pony tail?” Zack looked up at his head, frowning. “Maybe.” Pulling out the thing holding his hair up, Zack let it all flow down. Zack never cut his hair; he let it grow down past his knees. “My mother did something last night.” Mr. Raven looked over at him, his glass pouring hot liquid down his throat. “So you awakened then did you?” This was a shock for him, wondering how Mr. Raven new about that? “How…” “Zack, I was the one who pulled you out, I help take care of you, so, I know more than you do.” Now thing were making sense. “That’s why you gave me all of these jobs, huh?” Mr. Raven laughed, almost spilling his drink. “No, I gave them too you because it’s your job to take them.” Zack understood now, he was really watching over him, even though Mr. Raven wouldn’t admit it. “So, are you like, my uncle?” “No, I’m you middle man.” Mr. Raven handed him a file from his jacket. “The girl should arrive around eleven ’o clock. Till then, here is another job for you.” Zack looked over the file, and he didn’t like it. “I really hate you sometimes.” He said as he threw the parchment at Mr. Raven. “I know.” And with that, he got up and left.

11111211.content:
“Man this suck!” Zack complained as he went into the house, waking Cait, who was sleeping on the couch. “What’s wrong now?” She was half asleep. “Mr. Raven wants me to protect some girl, but that’s not why I mad,” he said, taking a seat on the floor. “I’m mad because I have to do a stupid gathering job in the forest.” Cait sat up and listened. She knew that gathering was not a skill of his. “Why are you doing it then? Is the pay good?” Zack ran his fingers through his hair, sighing. “Yeah, but the problem is that I’m not the one gathering.” Now Cait was confused. “I thought that you hated gathering?” “I do, it’s just that I can do the job in over a minute, but I have to watch out for monsters while some dumbass priests do it.” Zack stood up, rubbing his shoulder. “Your shoulder bugging you?” Cait asked. Zack nodded, walking over and sitting in front of her. Taking out the cream, Cait told him to take off his vest and shirt. Doing as he was told, Zack removed his garments and moved his hair over to the left side. On his right, was a arm made of auto mail, a robotic arm attached to his very nerves, making his arm movements the same as his old arm. Attached to his chest was a plate that concealed the spot that his arm connected to his body, and every now and then, it would start to rub and chafe his skin, and his fingers were too big to fit between the metal and his skin. Taking the ointment and putting some on her fingers, Cait moved her fingers into the space and rubbed the cream on his skin. As she did this, she couldn’t help but remember how it happened.

A few years ago, Zack was one of the first kids to become First-class his school, and to complete his transition to first, he had to do a First-class job. His job was to find out what was killing local Popo, and stop it. When he got to a local farm, he saw a whole heard of Popo, lying in a pool of their own blood. When he went out to inspect it, he found a man with a giant knife, licking the blood off it. The man turned and saw him, and started to swing madly at Zack, forcing him to back up and trip over a Popo corpse. Just as the mad man was about to kill him, a fellow class mate, Sarah Garver, came and stopped the man’s blade from killing him. The maniac kicked her over the Popo corpse and went after her. Zack was scared then, not for himself, but for her. Getting up, Zack ran as fast as he could, trying to get in front of the man. But when he did, the man had swung his knife, cutting off Zack right arm and taking half of his left leg. When the man heard the sound of flesh tearing, he stopped and looked down, seeing his prizes and took off with them in his arms, fleeing. When help came, he was taken to the hospital, where Sarah waited. When I arrived, he was still asleep, with Sarah was sitting next to him. When he awoke, he said nothing, except asking if Sarah was alright. Sarah had suggested that she give him auto mail to replace his missing limbs. And since then, he has had auto mail limbs.

When Cait was done, Zack asked if he if she could give him something to eat before he left. Cait looked up at the clock. 3:00. “Yeah, sure.” When she got up, she could see that Zack’s eyes had glazed over, a normal thing for him. When that happened, it meant that he was thinking about the past. “Zack,” she nudged him. “Zack, wake up.” “Huh?” Zack looked up at his mother’s face, her sweet caring face. “You should get ready before you have to go, and take a coat.” Zack smiled. His mom let him act like an adult, but she still treated him like a kid when she had to. After feeding him, Cait then went to the kitchen to clean when Zack yelled for her. When she went in, what she saw was too good. Zack had gone into his chibi form. “Mom, a little helps please?” Cait just stood in the door way, giggling to herself. “Mom!
